Invocation Name: comcast stories
Developer Terms of Use
des: Internet Essentials from Comcast launched in 2011 with a goal to help bridge the digital divide. Since 2011, the program has connected more than 8 million Americans from low-income homes to the internet at home; most for the first time. Hear Senior Executive Vice President David Cohen explain why he believes in the equalizing power of bringing the Internet to people without access.
priv:
